alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:26AM PST until December 24 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow with areas of blowing snow. Snow accumulation`s of 4 to 10 inches above 7000 feet with 2-4 inches below 7000 feet. * WHERE...Elevations above 6500 feet in northern Elko County * WHEN...Late Thursday morning through Friday morning * IMPACTS...Roads may become snow covered at times, especially State Route 225 north of Wildhorse. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the snow, refreezing or black ice poses a travel hazard Friday morning.
info.instruction: A winter weather advisory means that travel difficulties are expected due to wintry conditions. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For the latest road conditions call 511 or visit http://www.nvroads.com.
